trends: There have been 11 other sightings in Chula Vista
There was one other sighting in Chula Vista on or around February 8th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi woke up suddenly at 1:58 am on 02\08\06. went onto the 3rd story balcony of my apartment. saw very bright object with pulsating green, orange, white and blue lights, right above trees but as far up as a low flying airplane in the western sky. seemed to be hovering. got bigger, then smaller. watched it for about 40 minutes. filmed it for over 6 minutes with a mustek 4.0 mega pixel digital camera. saw smaller, star-like object to the right of this object, left of the moon but was unable to get it on film. night was clear with very few, whispy clouds. the object asecended into western sky until it was as small as a small star, with lights still pulsating.
